name: Chinese Tagar
description: Chinese Tagar or Crape Jasmine plant, which is a flowering shrub known for its fragrant white blossoms. It is also called Mini Tagar or Chandni and is suitable for tropical and subtropical climates.
careInstructions: Water moderately, allowing soil to dry slightly between waterings. Provide bright indirect light and maintain humidity for best blooms. Prune regularly to maintain shape.
benefits: Popular for both ornamental and medicinal purposes. The fragrant white flowers create a pleasant ambiance and can be used in traditional medicine.

name: Gold Dust Dracaena
description: Gold dust dracaena, also called spotted dracaena, is a species of flowering plant in the family Asparagaceae, native to west and west-central tropical Africa.
careInstructions: Thrives in low to bright indirect light. Water when top 2 inches of soil is dry. Tolerates neglect well, making it perfect for beginners.
benefits: Excellent air purifier that removes toxins from indoor air. Low maintenance and adapts well to various light conditions.

name: Orange Jasmine
description: Murraya paniculata, commonly known as orange jasmine, orange jessamine, china box, or mock orange, is a species of shrub or small tree native to South Asia, Southeast Asia and Australia.
careInstructions: Requires bright indirect light and regular watering. Fertilize monthly during growing season. Prune after flowering to encourage bushier growth.
benefits: Fragrant white flowers with citrus scent. Can be grown as a hedge or ornamental plant. Attracts butterflies and beneficial insects.

name: Chinese Money Plant
description: Chinese Money plant is an excellent indoor plant due to its ability to eliminate bad air. It is an Air Purifier plant as it efficiently removes indoor pollutants.
careInstructions: Place in bright indirect light and rotate weekly for even growth. Water when top inch of soil is dry. Easy to propagate from offshoots.
benefits: Natural air purifier with beautiful coin-shaped leaves. Believed to bring good luck and prosperity according to Feng Shui. Perfect for living room, balcony, or bedroom.

name: Lucky Bamboo
description: Premium Lucky Bamboo: A 2-layer bamboo plant symbolising prosperity, good luck, and positive energy. Perfect indoor plant for home, office, or gifting that thrives in low or bright light.
careInstructions: Can be grown in water or soil. Change water weekly if growing in water. Avoid direct sunlight. Keep away from drafts and temperature extremes.
benefits: Symbol of prosperity and good luck in Feng Shui. Extremely low maintenance and can thrive in various conditions. Perfect for beginners and gifting.

name: Aglaonema Red
description: Aglaonema Red is one of the most stylish houseplants and needs minimal care and can thrive extremely well in low light levels. With its colorful foliage, this plant is a perfect home-decor plant.
careInstructions: Tolerates low light but colors are more vibrant in medium light. Water when top inch of soil is dry. Avoid cold drafts and temperatures below 60Â°F.
benefits: Natural air-purifier and mood booster. Perfect for anyone curating their home garden collection or upgrading their interior aesthetics. Highly adaptable to indoor conditions.

name: Philodendron White Princess
description: Philodendron White Princess Houseplants are known for their ability to Air Purifying by absorbing harmful toxins such as formaldehyde, benzene, and trichloroethylene.
careInstructions: Requires bright indirect light to maintain variegation. Water when top 2 inches of soil is dry. Provide support for climbing. Maintain humidity above 60%.
benefits: Excellent air purifier removing formaldehyde, benzene, and trichloroethylene. Releases oxygen during photosynthesis, enhancing indoor air quality. Stunning variegated foliage.

name: Moon Cactus
description: Moon cactus plants, also known as Hibotan cactus, Chin Cactus, Ruby Ball, or Red Cap, is a species of cactus from the Cactaceae family. You can place this plant anywhere in your place for a touch of greenery.
careInstructions: Provide bright light but avoid intense direct sun. Water sparingly, only when soil is completely dry. Ensure excellent drainage to prevent root rot.
benefits: Colorful grafted cactus that adds vibrant color to any space. Extremely low maintenance and perfect for small spaces. Unique decorative appeal.

name: Peperomia
description: Peperomia plant is a true air-purifying champion, ridding your space of toxins and infusing it with crisp, oxygenated air. Say goodbye to stale surroundings.
careInstructions: Prefers medium to bright indirect light. Water sparingly as thick leaves store water. Allow soil to dry between waterings. Avoid overwatering.
benefits: Excellent air purifier that removes toxins and increases oxygen levels. Compact size perfect for desks and small spaces. Pet-friendly and non-toxic.
